metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10744 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An incomplete fix was found for the fix of the flaw CVE-2020-1733 ansible:insecure temporary directory when running become_user from becomedirective. The provided fix is insufficient to prevent the race conditionon systems using ACLs and FUSE filesystems. Ansible Engine 2.7.18, 2.8.12,and 2.9.9 as well as previous versions are affected and Ansible Tower3.4.5, 3.5.6 and 3.6.4 as well as previous versions are affected.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
